info.name: Rithmo API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Rithmo Period Tracker application with all endpoints

variable.description: Current user ID (set manually if needed)
Partner user ID (set manually for partner operations)

request.description: Register a new user account with sex field
Activate user account using email token

request.description: Refresh access token using refresh token. New access token is automatically saved.
Verify if JWT token is valid
Test if authentication is working by getting current user info
Get current user's profile information including partners
Get current active invitation code if exists

Accept partner's invitation code to link accounts
Generate code to remove current partner
Remove current partner using remove code
Get all periods for authenticated user

Get comprehensive cycle analysis for user
Get personalized cycle insights and predictions
Analyze correlation between wellness metrics and cycle phases
Get ovulation prediction for latest period
Get ovulation prediction for specific period ID
Get all wellness logs for user
Create or update wellness log for today (auto-creates/updates based on date)
